values.title: Karl Lagerfeld
values.desc: Dont sacrifice yourself too much because if you sacrifice too much theres nothing else you can give and nobody will care for you

values.title: John Lennon
values.desc: If being an egomaniac means I believe in what I do and in my art or music then in that respect you can call me that I believe in what I do and Ill say it

values.title: Philip K Dick
values.desc: The problem with introspection is that it has no end

values.title: Eckhart Tolle
values.desc: Worry pretends to be necessary but serves no useful purpose

values.title: John Lennon
values.desc: Part of me suspects that Im a loser and the other part of me thinks Im God Almighty

values.title: CS Lewis
values.desc: If a man thinks he is not conceited he is very conceited indeed

values.title: Vladimir Nabokov
values.desc: I am sufficiently proud of my knowing something to be modest about my not knowing all

values.title: John ODonohue
values.desc: The ego is the false selfborn out of fear and defensiveness

values.title: Rousseau JeanJacques
values.desc: Or rather let us be more simple and less vain

values.title: Patrick Rothfuss
values.desc: She was a wicked thing sometimes All full of want As if the shape of the world depended on her mood As if she were important
